description:
After complete install openstack newton of nova-compute, when I start the nova-compute service, it dies immediately with error message:

2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service [req-44cf0677-f4c0-4fa1-9649-48e63c22486a - - - - -] Error starting thread.
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service Traceback (most recent call last):
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo_service/service.py", line 708, in run_service
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     service.start()
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py", line 117, in start
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     self.manager.init_host()
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1139, in init_host
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     context, self.host, expected_attrs=['info_cache', 'metadata'])
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo_versionedobjects/base.py", line 177, in wrapper
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     args, kwargs)
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/conductor/rpcapi.py", line 236, in object_class_action_versions
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     args=args, kwargs=kwargs)
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo_messaging/rpc/client.py", line 169, in call
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     retry=self.retry)
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo_messaging/transport.py", line 97, in _send
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     timeout=timeout, retry=retry)

2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     retry=retry)

2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     raise result
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service RemoteError: Remote error: UnsupportedVersion Endpoint does not support RPC version 3.0
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service [u'Traceback (most recent call last):\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/messaging/rpc/dispatcher.py", line 133, in _dispatch_and_reply\n    incoming.message))\n', u'  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo/messaging/rpc/dispatcher.py", line 185, in _dispatch\n    raise UnsupportedVersion(version)\n', u'UnsupportedVersion: Endpoint does not support RPC version 3.0\n'].
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service

I have the same nova version on controller node and compute node, and also when I try to run "openstack compute service list" on the controller node, it has error:

Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.ValueError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-499359d4-4362-48dc-8d7f-260d29c6900f)

title: nova-compute died immediatelly after start

comments.content:
After complete install openstack newton of nova-compute, when I start the nova-compute service, it dies immediately with error message:

2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service [req-44cf0677-f4c0-4fa1-9649-48e63c22486a - - - - -] Error starting thread.
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service Traceback (most recent call last):
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/oslo_service/service.py", line 708, in run_service
2016-12-26 20:49:36.844 27086 ERROR oslo_service.service     service.start()

comments.content: What's going on in the nova-conductor logs? This pretty much looks like a configuration of the rabbit connection info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
